name: Dee's Nuts
description:
Dee is a squirrel, who lives in a tree. Like any squirrel, Dee must collect nuts for the winter. Dee needs your help to collect as many nuts as possible and store them in the tree. Along the way, you will have to dodge threats from above and collect power-ups to aid you in collecting as much as you can.

Compete against your friends on the high-scores leaderboard to see who has the greater nut gathering skills!
